section_purpose: To provide detailed technical specifications of the model architecture used in the paper, based on the DEEPGATE4 framework with adaptations for circuit gate types and level-by-level propagation.
key_points: Adoption of the DEEPGATE4 framework with structural and functional embeddings updated via self-attention.
Implementation of type-specific aggregation and update functions for gate types: and, not, and div, handling logical semantics like negation and conjunction.
Use of attention weights in AND gates to reflect relative importance of inputs, such as controlling inputs.
Incorporation of positional encodings for the div gate to distinguish asymmetric roles of numerator and denominator inputs.
Level-by-level propagation algorithm based on topological levels, involving separate structural and functional aggregations.

algorithms: Level-by-level propagation algorithm where embeddings are updated sequentially from primary inputs to primary outputs using topological levels.
formulas: Equation (A1): h_v^s ← Agg_g^s({h_u^s | u ∈ P(v), L(u) = ℓ - 1}) and h_v^f ← Agg_g^f({h_u^f, h_u^s | u ∈ P(v), L(u) = ℓ - 1}), where P(v) is predecessor nodes, L(v) is topological level, and Agg are type-specific aggregators.
architectures: Based on DEEPGATE4 framework (Zheng et al. 2025).
Uses self-attention (Vaswani et al. 2017) for embedding updates.
Gate types: and, not, div with custom aggregators.

dependencies: DEEPGATE4 framework (Zheng et al. 2025) and self-attention mechanism (Vaswani et al. 2017).
Prior sections on graph construction (likely Section 3.2) for understanding topological levels and gate representations.
Knowledge of circuit structures and gate semantics from earlier methodology sections.
reproducibility_notes: Model architecture details: use of DEEPGATE4 framework and adaptations for gate types.
Specific aggregator functions for AND, NOT, and DIV gates, including positional encodings for DIV.
Level-by-level propagation algorithm as defined in equation (A1) for updating embeddings based on topological order.
